a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(min(a + b, b + c, a + c))

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
print(min(a+b, b+c, a+c))


def main():
    a, b, c, d = map(int, input().split())
    print(min(a+b, a+d, b+d, c+d))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

    a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
    print(min(a + b, a + c, b + c))

    main()

a = int(input())
b = int(input())

print(a + b)
print(a - b)
print(a * b)

def main():
    a, b, c, d = map(int, input().split())
    print(min(a + b, a + c, b + c, d))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

    print(min(a + b, a + c, b + c))

    main()

def main():

    print(a+b)
